divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I retired for the evening I found it hard to sleep. Then I heard a sudden loud high pitched sound in my bedroom, and outside. The sound reminded me of the planet Venus somehow. I got up on my elbow trying to make ends-meet of where the sound was coming from (the source of the sound), but I could not. Finally the sound got slowly dimmer, as though an object outside was slowly moving away. The sound got dimmer in my bedroom, until silence. The next morning I looked at my CASIO solar calculator and to my complete surprise I saw on it: -PPP1000000 to the power of 14. The 2 last Ps were separately underlined. I have no idea what it means, as I bought that calculator 6 months ago, and it never did anything like that. It is a new $14 calculator I bought at Office Depot. The number of digits on the code exceeded the calculators maximum by 2 digits. I could never figure out how to work any of the buttons, besides the number buttons and the basic math tool buttons. It has Pi and all kinds of buttons that I never use or don't work. I immediately contacted MUFON Headquarters, and reported the incident. They were supposed to get back with me in 48 hours, but never did. Thank you.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around July 11th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: High pitched sound then finding a code or formula the next morning on my calculator
